transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello. Haan ji Aditya ji, kal aapke baat kar rahe ho, Uzaer ke manager, abhi unka aapke discussion hua tha.
Customer: Haan ji baat kare madam?
Executive: Sir IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan ji haan ji.
Executive: Ji ji. Raj Lakshmi stores ke liye maine connect kiya tha. To sir feedback wahi aapne ek wo diya tha not satisfied. To wo mistakenly hua hai kyunki Uzaer ne yahi bataya hai mujhe. Wo galti se hua hai kya?
Customer: That is not mistakenly actually there was a time allotted about 5 o'clock and there was a coincidence that sometimes he was busy sometimes I was busy. And the call was time was not proper we could connect barely for 10 15 minutes.
Executive: Ha ha ha ha.
Customer: So this is the reason you have shared a negative feedback.
Executive: Yes yes.
Executive: Okay okay. To sir if this is the issue then you just suggest me a time accordingly I will arrange. I have already put it five 5 pm for today. Haan ji.
Executive: Okay done sir. So Uzaer will be connecting. Actually we are not available for on Wednesdays to Fridays as we have auctions that day and Saturday is off and Sunday is off on your end. So Monday and Tuesday are best feasible for us to connect. Okay. And to be online. So I had suggested him to be online on Monday or Tuesday but never it comes up on Monday or Tuesday.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: So time does not match.
Executive: Sir sir if today you have given the time It's okay with today but anytime anytime for next conversion Monday or Tuesday is best suitable for us.
Executive: Monday and Tuesday. So sir this I will mention in our portal. So accordingly Uzaer will be connecting with you. So this is for sure that today at five Uzaer will connect with you and whatever the issue you are facing you can connect with him and he will resolve. Okay okay okay. So sir if this is the issue then on that basis can I close this concern?
Customer: Yes yes please.
Executive: Okay sir. So you will be receiving one feedback. So do share that feedback also. Okay sir.
Customer: Okay okay thank you.
Executive: Okay thank you sir have a nice day.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer shared negative feedback.

- Time was not proper to connect.



Resolution:

- Executive apologized for the inconvenience.

- Uzaer will connect today at 5 pm.

- Monday and Tuesday are best to connect.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will share the feedback.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, time, connection
